timestamp.name: timestamp
timestamp.description: Deprecated, please use the commands without the /timestamp prefix

ago.name: passée
ago.description: Spécifiez un timestamp dans le passé par rapport à l'heure courante

years.name: années
years.description: Combien d'années à soustraire du temps actuel

months.name: mois
months.description: Combien de mois à soustraire de l'heure actuelle

days.name: jours
days.description: Combien de jours à soustraire de l'heure actuelle

hours.name: heures
hours.description: How many hours to subtract from the current time

minutes.name: minutes
minutes.description: How many minutes to subtract from the current time

seconds.name: seconds
seconds.description: How many seconds to subtract from the current time

in.name: in
in.description: Specify a timestamp in the future relative to the current time

years.name: années
years.description: How many years to add to the current time

months.name: mois
months.description: How many months to add to the current time

days.name: jours
days.description: How many days to add to the current time

hours.description: How many hours to add to the current time

minutes.name: minutes
minutes.description: How many minutes to add to the current time

seconds.name: seconds
seconds.description: How many seconds to add to the current time

at.name: at
at.description: Specify the exact components of the timestamp (including the timezone)

responses.timezoneNotFound: Le fuseau horaire spécifié est introuvable

year.name: year
year.description: Specify the year (defaults to current year)

month.name: month
month.description: Specify the month (defaults to current month)

day.name: day
day.description: Specify the day (defaults to current day)

hour.name: hour
hour.description: Specify the hour (defaults to current hour)

minute.name: minute
minute.description: Specify the minute (defaults to current minute)

add.name: add
add.description: Add some time to the specified UNIX timestamp

years.name: years
years.description: How many years to add to the specified timestamp

months.name: months
months.description: How many months to add to the specified timestamp

days.name: days
days.description: How many days to add to the specified timestamp

hours.name: hours
hours.description: How many hours to add to the specified timestamp

minutes.name: minutes
minutes.description: How many minutes to add to the specified timestamp

seconds.name: seconds
seconds.description: How many seconds to add to the specified timestamp

subtract.name: subtract
subtract.description: Subtract some time from the specified UNIX timestamp

years.name: années
years.description: How many years to subtract from the specified timestamp

months.name: mois
months.description: How many months to subtract from the specified timestamp

days.name: jours
days.description: How many days to subtract from the specified timestamp

hours.name: heures
hours.description: How many hours to subtract from the specified timestamp

minutes.name: minutes
minutes.description: How many minutes subtract from to the specified timestamp

seconds.name: seconds
seconds.description: How many seconds subtract from to the specified timestamp

unix.name: unix
unix.description: Display the syntaxes for a specific UNIX timestamp

responses.invalidDate: La date spécifié est invalide (exemple : le jour n'existe pas)

format.name: format
format.description: Returns only the specified format in the response

columns.name: columns
columns.description: Specify which columns to display in the returned response

ephemeral.name: ephemeral
ephemeral.description: When true the response will only be visible to you (default: false)

header.name: header
header.description: Display the initial time (as interpreted by the bot) on top of the response

statistics.name: statistics
statistics.description: Displays various information about the bot

responses.noShards: (The bot is not currently using sharding)
